info.name: Subscriptions - Advanced
info.description:
- This set of tests expects you to be using the Base Account.
- **BEFORE YOU RUN THESE TESTS** you must log into the account _as admin_ and under Settings> Payment and enable 'Allow Saved Credit Cards'.
- The last tests in this collection run test rebills and payments. As such, the tests will pause for several minutes while these background processes run. If you are not aware of this, you might think the tests have "hung". When the timer starts, the start time will print to the runner output so you can see how much time is remaining.
- If running in development, you must have these two pages running. They will refresh automatically in the background. 
	- https://api-dev.comecero.com/jobs/create_subscription_invoices/
	- https://api-dev.comecero.com/jobs/pay_subscription_invoices/
